column4: how can I make a terminal launcher start on a different workstation?
like click it on my main workstation, but it runs on the 4th one
you could open an ssh session on the other box to your main work station
VCoolio: I misspoke. Its one computer, but the 4 desktop switchers. Thats what I was talking about
tried to use it, but since my DISPLAY spans two physical screens, i couldn't use it.
Im just wondering if it allows wildcards in it...oh wait, I got it :D
